content:
How to use this template Click the Use this template button above. Create a new repo from this template. Rename it to <your_repo_name>. Don’t forget to check the box Include all branches. Change the baseURL in config.yml to your site’s URL. e.g. https://<your_github_id>.github.io/<your_repo_name> Open GitHub Pages in your repo’s Settings -> Pages -> Source: Deploy from a branch -> Branch: gh_pages -> Folder: /root -> Save. (*Optional)Create a markdown file to write your content in content folder. (*Optional)Commit and push your changes to your repo. Bingo! Your site is live at https://<your_github_id>.github.io/<your_repo_name> Notice: If you meet the problem like remote: Permission to xxx denied to github-actions[bot]. when you push your changes, you need to give the permission to the github-actions[bot] in your repo’s by following the steps below: Settings -> Actions -> General -> Workflow permissions -> Read and write permissions -> Save.
images post文件夹下直接存放 Markdown 文件，图片存储在static/images文件夹下，引用时 , 但是github不支持这种相对路径，失败。
reference https://github.com/awesome-actions-template/hugo-papermod-template https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1ua411B7WH/?spm_id_from=333.880.my_history.page.click&vd_source=a4e3e223ffde8596a5f54a5af60f891d https://theplaybook.dev/docs/deploy-hugo-to-github-pages/
summary: How to use this template Click the Use this template button above. Create a new repo from this template. Rename it to <your_repo_name>. Don’t forget to check the box Include all branches. Change the baseURL in config.yml to your site’s URL. e.g. https://<your_github_id>.github.io/<your_repo_name> Open GitHub Pages in your repo’s Settings -> Pages -> Source: Deploy from a branch -> Branch: gh_pages -> Folder: /root -> Save. (*Optional)Create a markdown file to write your content in content folder.
title: hugo

content:
Markdown 标题 共有6级标题
H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 段落 这是第一段，bulabulabula
这是第二段，bulabulabula
引用 这是行内引用inline
这是一个段引用和脚标的栗子
— 出处1
表格 Name Age Bob 27 Alice 23 代码块 import os print("hello world") 列表 有序列表 First item Second item Third item 无序列表 List item Another item And another item KaTeX Inline math: \(\varphi = \dfrac{1+\sqrt5}{2}= 1.6180339887…\) Block math:
$$ \varphi = 1+\frac{1} {1+\frac{1} {1+\frac{1} {1+\cdots} } } $$
Emoji 可以直接输入Emoji表情，或者使用shortcode
🙈 :see_no_evil: 🙉 :hear_no_evil: 🙊 :speak_no_evil:
夜间模式 RSS link
这是一个脚标的栗子 ↩︎
